channel.title: Delta Server Problem[with pictures]
channel.description:
Problem 1: Friends List login and logout
Friend logs in: Greg has logged in
Friend logs out: Greg has logged in
[IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/2cwlsgj.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/1zdq41t.jpg[/img] __________________________________ Problem 2: Attack option is always there
Right click on friend and it says the following
Attack Greg Walk here Greg Follow Greg Trade Greg
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/jt8ape.jpg[/img] ____________________________________
